term: 14th amendment + why is it here anyway
content:
originally proposed cuz congress thought that future congresses could revoke Civil Rights Act of 1866
they made this permanent w/ amendment

3 maj points:
	1. requires states to extend = citizenship to blacks and all people born and naturalized in US
	2. denies states to deprive anyone of life liberty property w/o due process
	3. promised equal protection under the law of all persons
